"Annihilator's Apparition":
"Emergency message for all ARKS.
A fragment of Magatsu, which was
sealed away on planet Harkotan, has
manifested as a giant enemy and is
attempting to invade Shironia.
If it breaches their defensive walls, it will
cause unimaginable damage.
Do whatever you can to stop Magatsu.
――――――――――――――――――――
Fail: Final gate is destroyed, time limit expires."

"The operation to subdue the
Harkotan deity, \"Magatsu\", is about
to commence. Please conduct
your final equipment checks."

"This is a being said to have been
sealed within the planet itself.
We anticipate a large battle.
...Don't do anything stupid, and
don't let yourselves get careless."
